description: connecting both words (see above), and sentences

senses.description: connecting both words (see above), and sentences
The ו consecutive (formerly called the Waw 'conversive')

With a voluntative (cohortative or jussive) וְ expresses
    an intention,
    that or so that

It expresses often an informal inference, or consequence, so, then, especially at the
    beginning of
    a speech
